attributes.action: sort of dentist for those nhs patients who are in dire need and stop sweeping the problem under the carpet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have just been able to register my three children for nhs dentistry but not myself.  I live in the wellingborough area of Northamptonshire and am appalled by the lack of help for a person in severe pain which I am suffering from.  I believe you will have more people taking their own action until this problem is addressed and their could be a fatality either from overdoseing on painkillers or the actual extraction of the teeth please listen to the people and really do something about it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
